scripts.test: npm run compile && TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test ./test-suites/test-starlay/*.spec.ts
scripts.test-scenarios: npm run compile && hardhat test test-suites/test-starlay/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-starlay/scenario.spec.ts
scripts.test-subgraph:scenarios: npm run compile && hardhat test test-suites/test-starlay/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-starlay/subgraph-scenarios.spec.ts
scripts.test:main:check-list: npm run compile && FORK=main TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test  test-suites/test-starlay/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-starlay/astar/check-list.spec.ts
scripts.starlay:shibuya:dev:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:shibuya -- starlay:dev
scripts.starlay:shiden:dev:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:shiden -- starlay:dev
scripts.starlay:shibuya:set-fallback-oracle: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:shibuya -- set-fallback-oracle
scripts.starlay:shiden:set-fallback-oracle: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:shiden -- set-fallback-oracle
scripts.starlay:docker:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- starlay:astar --skip-registry
scripts.starlay:docker:full:migration:add-regist: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- starlay:astar
scripts.starlay:docker:add-market-to-registry-fr: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- add-market-to-registry --pool Starlay
scripts.starlay:shibuya:add-market-to-registry-f: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:shibuya -- add-market-to-registry --pool Starlay
scripts.starlay:shiden:add-market-to-registry-fr: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:shiden -- add-market-to-registry --pool Starlay
scripts.starlay:docker:add-market-to-new-registr: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- add-market-to-registry --pool Starlay --deploy-registry
scripts.starlay:shibuya:add-market-to-new-regist: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:shibuya -- add-market-to-registry --pool Starlay --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.starlay:shiden:add-market-to-new-registr: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:shiden -- add-market-to-registry --pool Starlay --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.starlay:fork:main: npm run compile && FORK=main hardhat starlay:astar
scripts.starlay:shibuya:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:shibuya -- starlay:astar
scripts.starlay:shiden:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:shiden -- starlay:astar
scripts.starlay:main:full:initialize: npm run compile && FORK=main full:initialize-tokens --pool Starlay
scripts.ci:test: npm run compile && npm run test
scripts.external:deploy-assets-shibuya: npm run compile && hardhat --network shibuya external:deploy-new-asset --symbol ${SYMBOL} --verify
scripts.external:deploy-assets-shiden: npm run compile && hardhat --network shiden external:deploy-new-asset --symbol ${SYMBOL} --verify
